price: ߞߏ߫ ߌ ߟߊ߫ ߞߊ߬ߝߊ ߞߊ߬ߙߊ߲߫ ߞߍ߬ ، ߌ ߞߊ߬ ߥߛߊ߬ ߞߴߌ ߖߘߍ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߌ ߖߍ߬ߘߍ߫ ߡߊ߬ ߖߊ߬ߕߋ߬ߓߐ߬ߟߊ߫ ߘߌ߫ ߓߌ߬
arabic: ٱقۡرَأۡ كِتَٰبَكَ كَفَىٰ بِنَفۡسِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ عَلَيۡكَ حَسِيبٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: iq'ra kitābaka kafā binafsika al-yawma ʿalayka ḥasīban
